document_data.caption: Chilled to the bone by Zajimarn's Ice Claw Prison.
document_data.name: Zajimarn's Ice Claw Prison
document_data.mainbody: '''''Zajimarn's ice claw prison''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s and [[sorcerer]]s and by [[cleric]]s with the [[Cold domain]]. This spell was created by [[Zajimarn]].
document_data.Effects:
This spell created a large reptilian icy claw that could be used to grasp at targets. Any creature grabbed by the claw would by physically harmed by both the extreme cold of the claw and by any crushing action.

The ''icy claw prison'' was immune to most magical effects that did not cause harm. Also, it could push through a ''[[wall of force]]'' or similar magical barriers. The claw was immune to cold-based attacks but was susceptible to fire or heat. It could be destroyed by a ''[[disintegrate]]'' or ''[[dispel magic]]'' spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a white leather glove and a piece of clear rock crystal to cast.
